LEARN MORE ABOUT

Precicion Import Auto Repair

For more than 20 years, family-owned and operated Precision Import has been providing expert vehicle repair in Corona. Our customer service first approach allows us to connect with our friends and neighbors and really dive into their automotive troubles. Instead of hearing one or two symptoms we want to know the whole story about your car trouble so we can quickly and accurately diagnose and repair the problem.
As a full-service auto repair shop we offer everything from factory scheduled maintenance and oil change services to complete engine rebuils and transmission repair. We specialize in Japanese auto repair but also excel at domestic and European auto maintenance as well. When you need professional auto repair in Corona call Precision Import at +13333333333 to schedule an appointment!
